                                                                         Hex-Dump Conversion


Tobacco -- We are making good progress on our review of the tobacco settlement. Secretary
Shalala and I met this week with Drs. Koop and Kessler, Attorneys General Moore and Gregoire;
and leading public health and tobacco control·groups. In internal meetings, we've identified the
major legal and policy issues, have analyzed the economic effects of the settleinent, and are
developing options in key areas. Next week we will meet with the tobacco industry, tobacco
farmers, and additional public health experts. Donna and I will also consult with mernbers of
Congress, beginning with a Senate democratic task force chaired by Senator Conrad.
"
